Description: TOP FLOOR UNIT! This building went through a complete gut renovation to be transformed into the beautiful apartment you see now. 3 spacious bedrooms accompanied by 2 full bathrooms. Tons of living and dining space. Large windows that let in a ton of natural light. Walk out through the slider in the living room onto a massive back deck, with amazing views of the city! This unit is centrally located, with quick access to the highway as well as being minutes from the redline. Close proximity to all of the popular restaurants, bars, and coffee shops that South Boston is known for! A rare opportunity to be the first person to live in a spotless apartment in South Boston! Brand new kitchen & appliances, large bedrooms, true living/dining space. Call/text the provided number for a showing.
